channel.title: How to rename items?
channel.description: How would I go about renaming items? Can it be server side or only client side? And can I change the examine info through the server, or would I have to make my own client?

item.title: How to rename items?
item.dc:creator: @Jake_Ericson Jake Ericson
item.description:
@Jake_Ericson wrote:

Yeah I thought it didn’t work. Ill try again though, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: How to rename items?
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

also the bonuses are off to the right of that… see the 0 0 0 -15 0 81 93 98 you can change those to what ever you want for bonuses

Read full topic

item.title: How to rename items?
item.dc:creator: @Vanack Vanack
item.description:
@Vanack wrote:

I’m sort of brain dead at the moment. There is a text-bases file that you can change the name of the item. You can only see the changed name when your examining the equip area. (The area that you change fighting styles). The rest is client side.

Don’t mind if I’m wrong. I can’t think right now.

Read full topic

item.title: How to rename items?
item.dc:creator: @Jake_Ericson Jake Ericson
item.description:
@Jake_Ericson wrote:

Thanks man. Trying to make a dragon defender out of a dragon dagger

Read full topic

item.title: How to rename items?
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

yes you can… just one second ill find it all.

go to item.cfg
press ctrl+f
type in the name you want… say its Dragon_chain

item = 3140	Dragon_chainbody	A_series_of_connected_metal_rings.	10000	10000	10000	0	0	0	-15	0	81	93	98	-3	82	0	0

that will pop up… just change the name… so instead of dragon_chain put it at lets say… Crazy_Chainbody the next part a_series_of_connected_metal_rings. is the examine. change those make sure that there is an underscore “_” for the spaces…

Read full topic
